title: Fresh Choice
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small juice and sandwich shop serving sandwiches, soups, curry, salads, smoothies, freshly squeezed juices and more. As of July 2014, only place in the city that actually has a selection of meals for vegans. Confirmed vegan choices are the veggie life sandwich, veggie curry, veggie noodle dish, all soups, wakame salad, bulgur salad, mezze (babaganoush, hummus, pita bread). Smoothies and milkshakes can be made vegan. Offers soymilk for coffee/tea.
